docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v1 is currently the default API version.

methods.name: index
examples:
GET /api/subnets
200
[
  {
    "subnet": {
      "priority": null,
      "name": "one",
      "network": "2.3.4.0",

  },
  {

methods.name: show

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:
GET /api/subnets/980190962
200
{
  "subnet": {
    "priority": null,
    "name": "one",
    "network": "2.3.4.0",
    "dns": {
      "url": "http://else.where:4567",
      "name": "DNS Proxy",
      "id": 113629430
    },
    "dns_secondary": null,
    "domain_ids": [
      822172901
    ],
    "tftp_id": 298486374,
    "id": 980190962,
    "dhcp_id": 980190962,
    "dns_id": 113629430,
    "dhcp": {
      "url": "https://somewhere.net:8443",
      "name": "DHCP Proxy",
      "id": 980190962
    },
    "dns_primary": null,
    "vlanid": "41",
    "mask": "255.255.255.0",
    "tftp": {
      "url": "http://somewhere.else",
      "name": "TFTP Proxy",
      "id": 298486374
    },
    "from": null,
    "gateway": null,
    "to": null
  }
}

methods.name: create

params.name: from
params.description: Starting IP Address for IP auto suggestion

params.name: to
params.description: Ending IP Address for IP auto suggestion

params.name: domain_ids
params.description: Domains in which this subnet is part

params.name: dhcp_id
params.description: DHCP Proxy to use within this subnet

params.name: tftp_id
params.description: TFTP Proxy to use within this subnet

params.name: dns_id
params.description: DNS Proxy to use within this subnet

examples:
POST /api/subnets
{
  "subnet": {
    "name": "QA2",
    "network": "10.35.2.27",
    "mask": "255.255.255.0"
  }
}
200
{
  "subnet": {
    "priority": null,
    "name": "QA2",
    "dns": null,
    "network": "10.35.2.27",
    "dns_secondary": null,
    "domain_ids": [],
    "id": 980190963,
    "tftp_id": null,
    "dhcp_id": null,
    "dns_id": null,
    "dhcp": null,
    "dns_primary": null,
    "vlanid": null,
    "mask": "255.255.255.0",
    "tftp": null,
    "gateway": null,
    "from": null,
    "to": null
  }
}

params.description: Domains in which this subnet is part

methods.name: destroy
examples:
DELETE /api/subnets/980190962
422
{
  "subnet": {
    "id": 980190962,
    "errors": {
      "base": [
        "2.3.4.0/24 is used by temp-01.yourdomain.net",
        "2.3.4.0/24 is used by suse01.yourdomain.net",
        "2.3.4.0/24 is used by temp01.yourdomain.net",
        "2.3.4.0/24 is used by anotherfullhost",
        "2.3.4.0/24 is used by temp.yourdomain.net",
        "2.3.4.0/24 is used by my5name.mydomain.net",
        "2.3.4.0/24 is used by dhcp.mydomain.net",
        "2.3.4.0/24 is used by otherfullhost",
        "2.3.4.0/24 is used by sdhcp.mydomain.net",
        "2.3.4.0/24 is used by sol10host",
        "2.3.4.0/24 is used by sdhcp.mydomain.net"
      ]
    },
    "full_messages": [
      "2.3.4.0/24 is used by temp-01.yourdomain.net",
      "2.3.4.0/24 is used by suse01.yourdomain.net",
      "2.3.4.0/24 is used by temp01.yourdomain.net",
      "2.3.4.0/24 is used by anotherfullhost",
      "2.3.4.0/24 is used by temp.yourdomain.net",
      "2.3.4.0/24 is used by my5name.mydomain.net",
      "2.3.4.0/24 is used by dhcp.mydomain.net",
      "2.3.4.0/24 is used by otherfullhost",
      "2.3.4.0/24 is used by sdhcp.mydomain.net",
      "2.3.4.0/24 is used by sol10host",
      "2.3.4.0/24 is used by sdhcp.mydomain.net"
    ]
  }
}
